channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Health Advisor by CloudBees Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Health Advisor by CloudBees Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2093|2024-08-04T06:54:00.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20health%20advisor%20by%20cloudbees%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Health Advisor by CloudBees Plugin 3.0 and earlier allows attackers to send an email with fixed content to an attacker-specified recipient.

item.title: CVE-2020-2094|2024-08-04T06:54:00.717Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20health%20advisor%20by%20cloudbees%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Health Advisor by CloudBees Plugin 3.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to send a fixed email to an attacker-specific recipient.

item.title: CVE-2020-2258|2024-08-04T07:01:41.275Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20health%20advisor%20by%20cloudbees%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Health Advisor by CloudBees Plugin 3.2.0 and earlier does not correctly perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to view that HTTP endpoint.
